LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="651b3797ff994b69b4082d978ae11b5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're the one who saved me...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="651b3797ff994b69b4082d978ae11b5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Well, that means I still survived,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I won
the battle between myself and this planet
after all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="651b3797ff994b69b4082d978ae11b5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I did get a little help from you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it's not
like that matters in a survival challenge
where anything goes.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="6b2edf4c355441d188c05aa006e432db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's an ongoing battle happening
between you and this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6b2edf4c355441d188c05aa006e432db" Scale="1"/]A long-haul fight can make it hard to
stay focused.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's simplify and settle
things once and for all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6b2edf4c355441d188c05aa006e432db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]how about this? [etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]You win if you
defeat more than 100 creatures
indigenous to this planet.[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6b2edf4c355441d188c05aa006e432db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]What's the meaning of such a challenge?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
There is no meaning.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Some challenges only
have significance if they're meaningless.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="25c7d8ffc6e2422cab2314717eef8f66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you want to
challenge me to figure out which
of us is real?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="25c7d8ffc6e2422cab2314717eef8f66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Never mind.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Such a challenge would be a
farce.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It doesn't matter if you're real
or not.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="97b74f572f6b49c0995f51ca336d981f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's a glimmer deep in your eyes that
tells me you've made it through countless
difficulties.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="47e9cf60dd85413c83912b4013b1f751" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Isn't there a saying about "all bark and no
action," or something?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You seem like the
quiet type that actually gets things done.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="6f7ebb5247354c1e9becb361d40106d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You won this challenge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f7ebb5247354c1e9becb361d40106d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The honor and compensation are small,[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
but don't you feel accomplished?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="7dec48a8453f4445b529f00a9237fbea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Maybe I should challenge you to a real
battle someday.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="defa582dc0cf4e52a8f85eaae3c3798c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Once you make a decision,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you don't
hesitate.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I appreciate your spirit and
determination.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="6bc41c296e6242558a677821e5178054" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's the reward for your determination.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You definitely earned it.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="4e42e4e018de47d483c3cfd36137d266" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Whoops, the winner was already declared.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I can't believe I didn't see that coming.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="9c38165318154b5b9d8263817ca7c96c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I wish I could see the end of the battle
between you and this planet with my
own eyes.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="0267723139db413ba77c6434b08c8b6b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's obvious that you possess great skill
and are remarkably efficient!

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="c3197e31154e480bb1441e2ef3b98fe4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's not a lot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but please accept those.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I suppose you could call it a small reward.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="00f209f65ae24b018cac8d12dba46e78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Why did I come to this planet?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Huh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] why
would you ask?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="00f209f65ae24b018cac8d12dba46e78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Even if I told you my story,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not like it
matters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's no more useful than dust
floating around in space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="00f209f65ae24b018cac8d12dba46e78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You wouldn't know if I was telling the
truth anyhow.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It would just be idle chatter
meant to reassure you for a moment.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="066c1f1e0ac449f3b46f207980b6f6f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The battle between you and this planet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I intend to bear witness until the end.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="d18763a3f6d84ca49516edb180c827c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you put too much on your plate without
knowing your limits,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you will end up having
a meltdown.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d18763a3f6d84ca49516edb180c827c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Things will start slipping through your
fingers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and you'll fall apart.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="db6633577757452e9f1728de5b7509f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let life take its course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's meant to
happen will happen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so why not just do
the things you want to do?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="4b6cc2faae7f45f88b0d0bf3acb45b59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What have I been doing up till now?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Past or
futureâ€”makes no difference...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b6cc2faae7f45f88b0d0bf3acb45b59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The tingling sensation in my brain...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the
meaningless, feverish excitement of the
challenges...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b6cc2faae7f45f88b0d0bf3acb45b59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]These are the things that make me feel
like I'm alive.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="ff6f90fb79b845e4b8663d529c10437b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Show no mercy in challenges.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe it's
disrespectful of others to go easy on them
because you assume they can't win.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="8dba198d109547ed9db9fb392cddade8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You think pundits are the type of folks
who stay inside the lines and live boring,
stable lives?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8dba198d109547ed9db9fb392cddade8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Not at all![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're the gamblers who bet
their lives on the path they've chosen.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
They're believers in their own dreams.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="8b10b36a3e6e4d8483c1ab6be4c01d49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Are you asking me for advice?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hope
you don't expect it to be at all helpful.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="c6bcb78e62ff4a42aa935241663d25b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Why am I always looking for challenges?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That's easy![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's all about thirst.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c6bcb78e62ff4a42aa935241663d25b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]An empty-hearted person like me has a
thirst they're looking to quench.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One that
can only be satisfied by a true challenge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c6bcb78e62ff4a42aa935241663d25b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That moment we sacrifice our safety and
put our lives on the line.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's what it
takes to quench the thirst,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for a time...
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="2722d63436e94e1e8ba9c8539f3030d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Eat or be eaten.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's the challenge of
the natural world.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="e515d71217474409bfc9a93b5700f74e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A promising youth...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The world you live in
is much different from mine.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e515d71217474409bfc9a93b5700f74e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You shine so bright it hurts my eyes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I shouldn't even look directly at you.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="d2a8c6cd9645476f9d40dbaea90dfbb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Putting your life on the line means there's
something that's more important to you
than your life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2a8c6cd9645476f9d40dbaea90dfbb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Do you have something like that too?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="b4c58916f578400da5a15c2db581219f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I don't have any more raw materials to
give you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not a thing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4c58916f578400da5a15c2db581219f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm sorry to say my supply has been
completely cleared out.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="14e4899759334025a7e3ccc47423615e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This place has the primitive and raw
battles that come with the beginning
of life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14e4899759334025a7e3ccc47423615e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe that's why I came here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] So I could
feel that.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="9eda9211f63847379959ca6cfce9f678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You're rather strange to come talk to me
time and time again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What is it you want
from me?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="c54d267545134a66ac2680ae6b8bf266" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Have you ever looked into the eyes of
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ordinary folks might
think he's just an average company man...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c54d267545134a66ac2680ae6b8bf266" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But those eyes show he's survived some
life-or-death situations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's a hint of
darkness in them.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="2eef56583ac348e087069529d01f872f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Whatever is going to happen in your life is
meant to happen.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2eef56583ac348e087069529d01f872f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]However, that also means that this
moment is happening for a reason.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2eef56583ac348e087069529d01f872f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's always the influence of someone's
will involved.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Whether it turns out to be
yours or someone else's.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="45789a452b7c448b9d6a1c7147a1f183" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I put everything in your hands.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After all,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
there aren't many challenges where
you're this certain who will win.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="b1c7d322adf1486b9e287c42a3c1b7df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I did everything I needed to do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In other
words,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I did my best and put myself in the
hands of fate.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="4fe2c15d58d94bc3ad8e2859bd3dc4c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When we castaways go home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] society
will blame us for being irresponsible.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4fe2c15d58d94bc3ad8e2859bd3dc4c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They'll talk about how we could have done
things differently with the benefit of
hindsight,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even if it is a pointless exercise.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="97e4d79506d148f4b0cbcd8cc279179a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's not so bad living lazily like this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] staying
in my comfort zone and having nothing to
do now and then.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And yet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="97e4d79506d148f4b0cbcd8cc279179a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]At the end of the day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my body and mind
crave the exhilaration of the challenges
that I know will set my soul on fire.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="bb8be3d966c6401181bcfd3310ad9932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Why did I come to this planet?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Huh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] why
would you ask?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bb8be3d966c6401181bcfd3310ad9932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Even if I told you my story,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not like it
matters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's no more useful than dust
floating around in space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bb8be3d966c6401181bcfd3310ad9932" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You wouldn't know if I was telling the
truth anyhow.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It would just be idle chatter
meant to reassure you for a moment.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="7d4661220a514144a7ae5f8358bdc525" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you put too much on your plate without
knowing your limits,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you will end up having
a meltdown.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7d4661220a514144a7ae5f8358bdc525" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Things will start slipping through your
fingers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and you'll fall apart.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="9b095188961f4a1f9d86b3c36cd0861d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let life take its course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's meant to
happen will happen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so why not just do
the things you want to do?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="d2244bb53a5140ec87a87f8b2778b8bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What have I been doing up till now?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Past or
futureâ€”makes no difference...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2244bb53a5140ec87a87f8b2778b8bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The tingling sensation in my brain...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the
meaningless, feverish excitement of the
challenges...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2244bb53a5140ec87a87f8b2778b8bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]These are the things that make me feel
like I'm alive.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="fa218d9321c24844b391aa3308ba45e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Show no mercy in challenges.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe it's
disrespectful of others to go easy on them
because you assume they can't win.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="0d0081a5ff264c3580617e7e69da0f6b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You think pundits are the type of folks
who stay inside the lines and live boring,
stable lives?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d0081a5ff264c3580617e7e69da0f6b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Not at all![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're the gamblers who bet
their lives on the path they've chosen.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
They're believers in their own dreams.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="62946da068de4700a308eaa34110631e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Why am I always looking for challenges?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That's easy![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's all about thirst.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62946da068de4700a308eaa34110631e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]An empty-hearted person like me has a
thirst they're looking to quench.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One that
can only be satisfied by a true challenge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62946da068de4700a308eaa34110631e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That moment we sacrifice our safety and
put our lives on the line.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's what it
takes to quench the thirst,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for a time...
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="af56ab1863b04165a5c5bcdf487d9314" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Eat or be eaten.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's the challenge of
the natural world.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="5ca7418a785e48af9fa7ac90d3acb433" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A promising youth...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The world you live in
is much different from mine.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5ca7418a785e48af9fa7ac90d3acb433" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You shine so bright it hurts my eyes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I shouldn't even look directly at you.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="cd3a9c4d00af4009ae74a360acd720dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Putting your life on the line means there's
something that's more important to you
than your life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd3a9c4d00af4009ae74a360acd720dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Do you have something like that too?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="a0195e39bdeb41b98574263d28c45aec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This place has the primitive and raw
battles that come with the beginning
of life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0195e39bdeb41b98574263d28c45aec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe that's why I came here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] So I could
feel that.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="760f057458544712a87f3c0a94add6be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You're rather strange to come talk to me
time and time again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What is it you want
from me?
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="34e1fa345d9944ea85540bcf043f0a73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Have you ever looked into the eyes of
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ordinary folks might
think he's just an average company man...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34e1fa345d9944ea85540bcf043f0a73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But those eyes show he's survived some
life-or-death situations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's a hint of
darkness in them.
LF004.LF004_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="d22df7e95f15421297eb5d20748c2a85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Whatever is going to happen in your life is
meant to happen.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d22df7e95f15421297eb5d20748c2a85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]However, that also means that this
moment is happening for a reason.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d22df7e95f15421297eb5d20748c2a85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's always the influence of someone's
will involved.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Whether it turns out to be
yours or someone else's.
